height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 30 Sep 2021 20:05:40 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/6156098ab414c10018632b17?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"a81854d49f0b0d0be38b3304fed7978c","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn52@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-29-850_3a83f3b1c16ef96f.webp","destWidth":4400,"destHeight":3300,"sourceBytes":300480,"destBytes":300480,"author":"ndailey@insider.com (Natasha Dailey)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6102caefea74d40019b9a56e?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn35@2020_3/2021/10/01/02-08-32-547_c107e434612e8b51.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn83@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-915_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=dKYF8qJ_cbs:NAOlplJtntc:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn83@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-30-948_2503aab232f42122.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=dKYF8qJ_cbs:NAOlplJtntc:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn96@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-32-739_dfc40dd476493772.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-043_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=dKYF8qJ_cbs:NAOlplJtntc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn48@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-30-923_1dc26d2a3968c66f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/dKYF8qJ_cbs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn87@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-33-288_f95ce4c07caa6d60.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1633054085716},{"createdTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"How to close and delete your Robinhood account","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-delete-robinhood-account","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6144e4a4a060c800184bbcd4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Hands holding iPad with Robinhood app to delete account on green background 2x1\" height=\"834\" width=\"1668\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Before you delete your Robinhood account, make sure you&#39;ve closed all your other related accounts and closed all your positions.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Robinhood; Rachel Mendelson/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>You can delete your Robinhood account easily through the app. The process takes three to five business days.</li>\n<li>Before closing your account, you&#39;ll need to sell your holdings or transfer them to another brokerage.</li>\n<li>There is no cost to deactivate your account, but transferring holdings costs a one-time fee of $75.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/investing-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Visit Insider&#39;s Investing Reference library for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Robinhood is a popular choice for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-trading\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">beginning stock market investors</a>, but at some point, you may want to delete the app and remove yourself from the platform. </p><p>As Jennifer Stein, director of client engagement at <a href=\"https://www.priebewealth.com/team/jen-matev\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Priebe Wealth</a>, explains, &#34;Robinhood has made headlines for misleading inexperienced investors and allowing them to make far riskier trades than they are comfortable taking on. Robinhood also does not offer retirement accounts, trust accounts, or many other investment vehicles outside of a standard brokerage investment account.&#34;</p><p>Whether you want to delete your account for the above reasons or for some other purpose, this guide will show you how.</p><h2><strong>Before you can close your Robinhood account</strong></h2><p>Prior to deleting your account, you&#39;ll first need to choose what to do with your holdings:</p><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/personal-finance/how-to-transfer-stocks-out-of-robinhood\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Sell all your shares</a> and close all positions - alternatively, you can just transfer them to another <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-a-brokerage-account\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">brokerage account</a> through Automated Customer Account Transfer Service (ACATS) form</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Close your debit card if you signed up for one</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Transfer all money out of your account to bring your balance to $0</li></ul><p>Just keep in mind: If you sell for less than you purchased the stock, you may lose money. You may also owe <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/personal-finance/how-much-is-capital-gains-tax\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">capital gains taxes</a> by doing so, so a transfer is typically the better option. &#34;This will allow investors to keep their investment but switch brokerages,&#34; Stein says. &#34;They can then determine the best strategy for selling the shares and diversifying if that is their ultimate goal.&#34;</p><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Quick tip:</strong> Calculate the taxes you may owe before you decide to sell your holdings. The exact amount will depend on how long you held the investments and your income level. The IRS breaks these taxes down <a href=\"https://www.irs.gov/taxtopics/tc409\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">here</a>. </p></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>Deleting Robinhood on iOS</strong></h2><ol><li>Open up the Robinhood app on your phone. From the home screen, click on the account icon,<strong> </strong>which looks like a silhouette of a person, located in the lower, right-hand corner of the screen.</li><li>Click on the three lines located in the top right corner (often called a &#34;hamburger&#34;).<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61561b9e7b09e80018e5a564?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of a Robinhood account profile on iOS with a circle around the Settings icon, which is three horizontal bars on the upper right corner of the screen.\" height=\"417\" width=\"821\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Tapping on the hamburger menu icon opens the Menu screen.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Aly J. Yale</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Scroll down and click <strong>Settings</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61561bd3b414c10018633481?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of Robinhood&#39;s Menu on iOS with a box around the Settings option.\" height=\"337\" width=\"820\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Your settings are found under your account menu.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Aly J. Yale</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Click on <strong>Account Information</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61561c007b09e80018e5a5b0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the settings menu on Robinhood iOS with a box around the Account Information option.\" height=\"478\" width=\"816\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You can deactivate your account from the Account Information screen.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Aly J. Yale</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Scroll down and select <strong>Deactivate Account</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61561c357b09e80018e5a5f6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the Account Information screen on Robinhood iOS with a box around the &#34;Deactivate your account&#34; option.\" height=\"493\" width=\"816\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You&#39;ll find the button to deactivate at the very bottom of your Account Information page.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Aly J. Yale</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Select <strong>Close Account</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61561c6fb414c1001863350f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the &#34;Close Your Account&#34; screen on Robinhood iOS with a box around the &#34;Close Account&#34; button.\" height=\"376\" width=\"815\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>It will ask you to confirm that you want to close your account, and then give you the above image. It takes three to five business days to process the deactivation.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Aly J. Yale</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li></ol></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>Deleting Robinhood on Android</strong></h2><ol><li>Open up the Robinhood app on your phone and go to your profile.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155dc537b09e80018e58c44?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the homescreen menu of Robinhood Android with a circle around the Account icon, which looks like the head and torso of a person.\" height=\"86\" width=\"529\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>This is what your profile icon looks like.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jasmine Suarez</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Navigate to the settings menu.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155dc91b414c1001863182f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of a profile on Robinhood Android with a circle around the Settings Menu icon on the upper right of the screen.\" height=\"290\" width=\"572\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Click on the icon that has three horizontal lines, commonly referred to as a hamburger icon.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jasmine Suarez</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Click on <strong>Settings</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155dcc1b414c1001863183d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the settings menu on Robinhood Android with a box around the &#34;Settings&#34; option.\" height=\"260\" width=\"614\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Your settings are found under your settings menu.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jasmine Suarez</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Click on <strong>Account Information</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155dd147b09e80018e58c79?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the Settings screen on Robinhood Android with a box around the &#34;Account information&#34; option.\" height=\"344\" width=\"611\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You can deactivate your account from the Account Information screen.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jasmine Suarez</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Scroll down and click <strong>Deactivate your account</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155dd45b414c1001863185c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the Account Information screen on Robinhood Android with a box around the &#34;Deactivate your account&#34; option.\" height=\"276\" width=\"570\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The option to deactivate your account will be at the very bottom of the screen.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jasmine Suarez</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li></ol></aside><h2>Frequently asked questions</h2><h3 class=\"faq-question\">How much does it cost to close a Robinhood account?</h3><p class=\"faq-answer\">If you sell your holdings and simply transfer the funds to your bank, closing your account is free. If you choose to transfer your holdings via ACATS, there is a $75 fee.</p><h3 class=\"faq-question\">How do I transfer assets to another brokerage?</h3><p class=\"faq-answer\">You&#39;ll need to initiate an ACATS transfer through your new brokerage. They will need your account number, which you can find under &#34;Account Information&#34; in the main menu. A quick note: Crypto holdings cannot be transferred to other brokerages. They will be liquidated, and your cash proceeds can then be transferred to your new account.</p><h3 class=\"faq-question\">What happens to my account records?</h3><p class=\"faq-answer\">For regulatory purposes, Robinhood will hold onto records of your account - including statements, trade confirmations, and tax documents - even after you&#39;ve closed it. You can continue to access them through the app. (Don&#39;t worry, re-downloading the app will not reactive your closed account.)</p><h3 class=\"faq-question\">How long does it take to close a Robinhood account?</h3><p class=\"faq-answer\">Once you&#39;ve liquidated or transferred your holdings, zeroed out your account balance, and requested the deactivation, Robinhood estimates it takes anywhere from three to five business days.</p><h2><strong>The financial takeaway</strong></h2><p>There may come a time when you&#39;re ready to delete your Robinhood account. Before doing so, you&#39;ll need to sell your holdings or transfer them to another brokerage. You should take into account possible capital gains taxes, as well as Robinhood&#39;s $75 fee for transfers, before deciding which route to take.</p><p>If you have questions about closing your account, reach out to Robinhood customer support directly. They can help guide you through the process.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module-end-of-article\" class=\"mceNonEditable\"><a data-type=\"60ad76c4e5224e47165fbabb\" data-title=\"Is Robinhood safe? 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"39 of the best coats for women, because winter will be here before you know it","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-winter-coat-women","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, Insider may earn an affiliate commission. <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/insider-reviews-expertise-in-product-reviews\">Learn more.</a></i></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6154b4f12fb46b0019bea307?format=jpeg\" alt=\"woman in green winter coat holding a clutch bag\" height=\"2003\" width=\"2670\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Vanni Bassetti/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li aria-level=\"1\">Coat season is right around the corner with chilly fall and winter weather on the way. </li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">The best coats of the season include trenches, wool overcoats, teddys, and faux-leather designs.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">Shop 39 of the best coat styles on the market in a range of silhouettes and price points.</li>\n</ul><p>Winter&#39;s most aggressive weather conditions may still be a month or two away, but we don&#39;t suggest waiting until the last minute to procure a new coat to keep you cozy and warm. Yes, because we like to plan ahead, but also because some of the best coats of the season are already available right now. </p><p>Taking autumn and winter into consideration, our top choices for coats are ones that can work for varying conditions. They include sleek vegan leather pieces and timeless trenches which are especially helpful during a windy forecast, as well as extra fuzzy teddy styles or puffers for when temperatures really start to plummet. Organized by style, the 39 options in this guide are undeniably practical but also showcase the latest trends and most comfortable fabrics in a wide range of price points. Ahead, explore all the best coats we predict you&#39;ll look forward to tossing on until spring makes its return next year.</p><h2>Here are the best winter coats for women in 2021:</h2><bi-shortcode id=\"table-of-contents-sticky\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents: Masthead Sticky</bi-shortcode>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tTrench coats\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615479c62fb46b0019be9308?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Woman in Henning Overtime trench coat\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Henning</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Due to their classic silhouette and typically not-too-heavy weight, trenches are considered an any-season piece of outerwear and ideal for transitional weather. The camel hue is timeless &#8212;&#160; and truly does complement anything it's paired with &#8212; but feel free to branch out into other versatile shades such as army green or navy blue. Even try a fresh interpretation with leather detailing on the trench coat's signature waist tie. The options are quite limitless &#8212; each of them perfect for wearing now and layering with your favorite knitwear as winter gets closer.</p><p><strong>Our top picks for trench coats:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"615473b615d6410011bfb5e8\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Overtime Trench (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154750215d6410011bfb5f1\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Cassidy Trench Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154769231045c0011e30788\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Classic Trench Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154777031045c0011e30796\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Oversized Belted Trench Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154785a31045c0011e3079a\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Hooded Trench Coat (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tPuffer coats\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615481842fb46b0019be95b0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Model wearing Tentree Cloud Shell long puffer coat\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Tentree</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The ultimate no-nonsense winter coat is the puffer. Embrace the plush texture and often less-shape-defining silhouette (though, some come with belts) in this sporty, practical, and undeniably insulated option. Because the puffer is also a very classic and traditional winter style, you'll find tons of interpretations from luxury labels to affordable brands.</p><p><strong>Our top picks for puffer coats:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61547b273b6945001180b683\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Mina Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61547c7a15d6410011bfb62a\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Cloud Shell Long Puffer (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61547da231045c0011e307c3\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Curve Quilted Longline Puffer Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61547efa3b6945001180b6ae\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Calina Maxi Lightweight Down Coat With Sash Belt (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154804815d6410011bfb666\" data-purchase-option=\"\">The Super Puff&#8482; Long (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tFaux leather coats\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61548928b414c1001862ea71?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Model wearing Apparis Natalia jacket\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Apparis</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Slick, sophisticated, and friendly to animals, vegan leather alternatives have skyrocketed in the past few years. Today the faux leather coat is one of the market's most desirable options, with finishes that look buttery smooth and luxe, regardless of their price. You can't go wrong with a classic black option that adds a little edge to any ensemble, but beautiful shades of green and tan are also great for wearing now and well into early spring, too.</p><p><strong>Our top picks for faux leather coats:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"615482cf31045c0011e307f5\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Belted Faux Leather Trench (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154845915d6410011bfb680\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Ashley Coat - Cypress Vegan Leather (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154855f3b6945001180b6f1\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Faux Leather Belted Jacket (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"615486703b6945001180b706\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Natalia Jacket (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"615487343b6945001180b71f\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Macey Faux Leather Extra Long Blazer (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tClassic wool overcoats\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6154901fb414c1001862ed2e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Woman in pink wool coat and floral jumpsuit\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">J.Crew</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>In single- and double-breasted options, the wool overcoat takes cues from classic menswear with a boxier shape. Available in a range of lengths &#8212; anywhere from just under the bum to sweeping the floor &#8212; this evergreen coat silhouette can suit tons of different styles and outfits. For instance, toss a sharp wool coat over a sweatsuit for an elevated errand-running ensemble or drape it over your favorite blazer to head to the office on a chilly weekend.&#160;</p><p><strong>Our top picks for classic wool overcoats:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61548aa73b6945001180b732\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Willow Wool Cocoon Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61548be115d6410011bfb6fb\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Womens Wool Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61548d003b6945001180b761\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Daphne Topcoat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61548e3e3b6945001180b77e\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Camel Wool Captain Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61548f6715d6410011bfb738\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Bristol Coat (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tQuilted coats\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615496bab414c1001862ef89?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Model wearing Mango Belt Quilted Coat\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Mango</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The quilted coat is the puffer's lightweight cousin that's incredibly on-trend for fall and winter in 2021. Another great transitional piece of outerwear, quilted styles can take on the appearance of coat liners or a handmade piece by your family's own craft master. Either way, the style features diamond-shaped seaming that'll help keep you warm while you wear it.</p><p><strong>Our top picks for quilted coats:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154913431045c0011e308c2\" data-purchase-option=\"\">The Skyline Maxi Bomber (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"615491f831045c0011e308dc\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Belt Quilted Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"615493de15d6410011bfb763\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Gloucester Gingham Quilted Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"615494d73b6945001180b7c8\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Austwell Quilted Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"615495fd15d6410011bfb76d\" data-purchase-option=\"\">The Cotton Quilted Jacket (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tWrap coats\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6154a4b8b414c1001862f21f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Model in Anine Bing Hunter coat\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Anine Bing</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The timeless wrap style offers the cozy feel of a wool overcoat with the cinched silhouette of a trench &#8212; the best of both worlds, if you will. In collarless and wide-collar options, this style offers some versatility as you can wear it open and loose or keep multiple layers neatly in place on your frame with the coat's waistline tie.</p><p><strong>Our top picks for wrap coats:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"615497e215d6410011bfb78b\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Hunter Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"615499f515d6410011bfb796\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Relaxed Robe Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61549aa331045c0011e3092d\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Belted Double Face Wool Blend Wrap Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61549e363b6945001180b806\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Belted Oversized Wool Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154a3543b6945001180b824\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Montage Wool Wrap Coat (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tTeddy coats\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6154a9e0b414c1001862f37d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Model wearing J.Crew Double-Breasted Teddy Sherpa Topcoat\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">J.Crew</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>For the highly tactile crowd, there's no more satisfying coat than the teddy. Made of plush shearling or faux furs, this style is slightly oversized no matter what silhouette you choose. It's also a coat option that's innately statement-making. Feel free to allow your ensemble to remain pared-back and simplistic as any of these teddy coats pack quite a punch, while keeping you toasty, too.</p><p><strong>Our top picks for teddy coats:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154a62e15d6410011bfb7e2\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Teddy Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154a71e31045c0011e30971\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Faux Shearling Button Front Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154a84715d6410011bfb7f6\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Double-Breasted Teddy Sherpa Topcoat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154a8ea15d6410011bfb801\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Teddy Overcoat (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tShawl collar coats\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6154b4b52fb46b0019bea2f7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Model wearing Wilfred Charlize Jacket\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Aritzia</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Often made from heavy double-faced wool or cushy cotton, this coat has an easy-to-wear silhouette. What stands out most is its generous and dramatic shawl collar, which adds a special element to every ensemble and, ultimately, brings attention to your face.</p><p><strong>Our top picks for shawl collar coats:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154aba131045c0011e30990\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Charlize Jacket (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154ac4c3b6945001180b853\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Marilyn Belted Coat (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6154ad593b6945001180b860\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Shawl Collar Coat Marinelli)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6154b4f12fb46b0019bea307?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn43@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-25-603_28f1aada85d83c5f.webp","https://i.insider.com/615479c62fb46b0019be9308?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn8@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-33-727_0ed0be6d4776297a.webp","https://i.insider.com/615481842fb46b0019be95b0?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn96@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-31-654_a7aee2a5bb72fccb.webp","https://i.insider.com/61548928b414c1001862ea71?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn48@2020_3/2021/10/01/02-08-35-247_9b9c710e718fe92f.webp","https://i.insider.com/6154901fb414c1001862ed2e?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn71@2020_4/2021/10/01/02-08-35-015_644ec740916c8d52.webp","https://i.insider.com/615496bab414c1001862ef89?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn27@2020_4/2021/10/01/02-08-35-041_dbccba854e585d2c.webp","https://i.insider.com/6154a4b8b414c1001862f21f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn95@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-31-190_eb913e9d7ebc11e3.webp","https://i.insider.com/6154a9e0b414c1001862f37d?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn59@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-30-164_51776c2035fcd589.webp","https://i.insider.com/6154b4b52fb46b0019bea2f7?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn68@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-32-864_e4a34d1864a36116.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn83@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-915_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=WdtvlCPm_g4:owWtMg7XX4k:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn88@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-33-021_493c4deaeab14940.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=WdtvlCPm_g4:owWtMg7XX4k:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn95@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-34-401_0ce4bd07456370dd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-043_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=WdtvlCPm_g4:owWtMg7XX4k:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn75@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-31-349_9b1b5dfa8bae9759.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/WdtvlCPm_g4":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn43@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-30-357_0b6cd496ecc30727.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1633054085737},{"createdTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"Deciding whether to buy a new car, lease, or buy used has never been tougher","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/buy-new-car-vs-used-leasing-chip-shortage-2021-9","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6102d5d8aedf2100190ef278?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Lincoln SUVs at a dealership.\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Lincoln SUVs at a dealership.\n<p class=\"copyright\">David Zalubowski/AP Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Absurdly high prices and scant inventories are complicating car buying. </li>\n<li>Shoppers should consider new factors when deciding between buying new, buying used, or leasing. </li>\n<li>Experts say being flexible is key in nearly every aspect of a car purchase. </li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Looking for a new set of wheels? It&#39;s time to unlearn everything you knew about car buying.</p><p>&#34;Whether or not this is your second car or your 10th car, all that stuff has to go out the window because the dynamics have become so bizarre,&#34; Ivan Drury, senior manager of insights at Edmunds, told Insider. &#34;If you go in with that same mindset, you&#39;re going to be severely disappointed.&#34;</p><p>What are those &#34;dynamics&#34; exactly? In a nutshell, the supply of used and new cars has plummeted to extreme lows, while prices have <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/used-cars-shortage-prices-inflation-explained-in-three-charts-2021-7\">soared to ridiculous highs</a>. The main culprit is a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/why-are-used-cars-so-expensive-now-shortages-pandemic-rentals-2021-7\">computer chip shortage</a> that&#39;s constrained vehicle production for months, but other factors have contributed too. </p><p>It all means that <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/when-will-car-prices-go-down-used-vehicles-chip-shortage-2021-9\">navigating a car purchase</a> has become much more of a headache than before. Faced with dwindling options and eye-watering price tags, shoppers&#39; central decision of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/personal-finance/lease-or-buy-car\">whether to buy new, lease a car, or buy used</a> has gotten substantially more challenging.</p><p>If you&#39;re looking to buy new, prepare to pay sticker price - or higher - don&#39;t expect to have your pick of all the options, colors, and models you&#39;re used to at the dealership, Drury said. Dealer incentives are hard to come by and haggling for a big discount isn&#39;t going to work these days, since vehicles are flying off lots in record time. </p><p>&#34;Expect to concede defeat in one way or another,&#34; Drury said. </p><p>But buying new is still your best bet for getting the latest technology and safety features.</p><p>To make the most of a new-car purchase, consider targeting less sought-after models, says Benjamin Preston, an automotive reporter at Consumer Reports. Pickups and all-wheel-drive SUVs are in high demand, but you may find better availability and prices if you search for sedans, hatchbacks, and small, front-wheel-drive SUVs, he said. </p><p>Leasing, as in the past, is good for people looking to manage monthly payments on a larger or more expensive new vehicle they can&#39;t afford to buy outright, Preston said. Lease payments are typically cheaper than loan payments. But the downside is you&#39;re paying to rent rather than working toward paying off a vehicle you&#39;ll eventually own. </p><p>Leasing has another appeal nowadays: as a stopgap measure to avoid the chaotic car market. Those reluctant to hunt frantically for a vehicle or who can&#39;t afford to pay today&#39;s absurd markups may be better off leasing temporarily until the market settles down, Drury said. </p><p>Shoppers traditionally found the most value on the secondhand market, but that&#39;s less clear as of late. Used-car values have shot up roughly 30% over the course of the pandemic, according to Edmunds, meaning that some lightly used vehicles cost as much or more as their new counterparts. Before deciding to stomach the inflated prices, Drury recommends that buyers do plenty of research and make sure they plan to keep their vehicle for an extended period.</p><p>Shoppers may be able to get a better deal if they look at older models, according to Preston. Fortunately, in 2021, even a seven- or nine-year-old vehicle has some advanced safety features and modern tech. </p><p>Coming out satisfied in this bizarre market boils down to how much you&#39;re willing to budge on factors like price, brand, options, and how you&#39;re obtaining a vehicle, Autotrader&#39;s executive editor, Brian Moody, told Insider. </p><p>&#34;The person who&#39;s probably going to do the worst in terms of finding what they want is the person who&#39;s very rigid,&#34; he said. &#34;The person who&#39;s going to do the best is the person who&#39;s going to be the most flexible on pretty much everything.&#34;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/buy-new-car-vs-used-leasing-chip-shortage-2021-9'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=KoO7Pt37UKE:F3q5EtZj-1U:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/KoO7Pt37UKE\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 30 Sep 2021 18:38:11 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/6155f6b6b414c100186322cb?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"706df5fb74ded7453ccf1f98deec1e78","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn64@2020_4/2021/10/01/02-08-29-920_7c5493c455f861b8.webp","destWidth":2222,"destHeight":1666,"sourceBytes":178704,"destBytes":178704,"author":"tlevin@insider.com (Tim Levin)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6102d5d8aedf2100190ef278?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn20@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-31-215_4f743943e42fb17c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn83@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-915_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=KoO7Pt37UKE:F3q5EtZj-1U:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn61@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-36-161_5f153fdf89d7db65.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=KoO7Pt37UKE:F3q5EtZj-1U:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn95@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-32-219_2b24ad1fda75a399.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-043_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=KoO7Pt37UKE:F3q5EtZj-1U:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn39@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-522_1dd2e904f5a4f368.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/KoO7Pt37UKE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn31@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-34-722_e84a10e278ea349a.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1633054085791},{"createdTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"Marco Rubio called the $3.5 trillion Democratic spending bill 'Marxism,' the latest example of the GOP baselessly linking things they oppose to communism","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/rubio-baselessly-calls-35-trillion-democratic-spending-bill-marxism-2021-9","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155f906b414c100186323be?format=jpeg\" alt=\"marco rubio ufo report\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Sen. Marco Rubio, R-Fla.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Tom Williams/CQ-Roll Call, Inc via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>GOP Sen. Marco Rubio said a Democratic spending bill that aims to bolster the social safety net is &#34;marxism.&#34;</li>\n<li>One expert told Insider this is &#34;nonsensical&#34; and &#34;hyperbole.&#34;</li>\n<li>It&#39;s the latest example of a Republican demonizing something they oppose by tying it to communism.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>GOP Sen. Marco Rubio of Florida denounced the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/whats-in-democrats-35-trillion-infrastructure-economic-plan-2021-9\">$3.5 trillion spending bill</a> being pushed by Democrats, which includes provisions to address climate change and expand the social safety net, as &#34;Marxism.&#34;</p><p>Rubio tweeted: &#34;The $3.5 trillion Biden plan isn&#39;t socialism, it&#39;s marxism.&#34;</p><p>This does not make sense, based on the definition of Marxism, and the Florida Republican was mocked by economists, historians, and Democrats about it on Twitter.</p><p>&#34;Rubio is engaging in political hyperbole, a sin which both Republicans and Democrats commit quite often,&#34; Thomas Alan Schwartz, a Vanderbilt University historian and political scientist, told Insider. &#34;What the Democrats are doing with the $3.5 trillion dollar program is one of the largest additions to the American welfare state since the Great Society in the 1960s. To that extent I do understand the hyperbole, even if it&#39;s nonsensical.&#34;</p><p>Marxism, experts say, is a term employed to describe ideas posited by Karl Marx: the vision of a communist society whose workers share ownership of the means of production, therefore abolishing capital markets and the private wealth it generates - a political philosophy that in practice has never been achieved and mostly leads to the same widespread impoverishment it was intended to address.</p><p>Rubio&#39;s office did not immediately respond to a request for comment from Insider regarding how the GOP senator defines Marxism and how the bill qualifies as such. </p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Chris Murphy  (@ChrisMurphyCT) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1443587964383100941?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">September 30, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Paul Krugman  (@paulkrugman) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1443580592352686091?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">September 30, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><h2>Republicans continue to make &#39;socialism&#39; a boogeyman</h2><p>The Florida senator&#39;s &#34;marxism&#34; tweet is just the latest example of a Republican attempting to demonize something or someone they oppose by linking it to communism or socialism.</p><p>&#34;Socialism&#34; and &#34;communism&#34; have long been dirty words in the US, which is largely thanks to the Cold War and the anti-Soviet sentiments and paranoia that typified that era. Polling continues to show that most Americans have <a href=\"https://www.surveymonkey.com/curiosity/axios-capitalism-update/\">a negative view</a> of socialism, though there&#39;s an evident generational divide in this regard.</p><p>&#34;&#39;Socialism&#39; itself has lost some of its edge for many Americans, since they might associate it with European welfare states that aren&#39;t all that threatening,&#34; Schwartz said, adding that Rubio throwing in Marxism &#34;does add a great sinister element&#34; given the term is &#34;closely associated with the Soviet Union and all of its horrific history.&#34;</p><p>Republicans have played off of these sentiments by routinely labeling Democrats as socialists, Marxists, and communists.</p><p>During the 2020 campaign season, President Donald Trump and his allies <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-socialism-focus-line-of-attack-against-2020-democrats-2019-2\">repeatedly sought to tie Democrats to socialism.</a> This was partly linked to the fact that Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont, an independent who ran as a Democrat in 2016 and 2020, is a self-declared democratic socialist (there&#39;s a difference <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/difference-between-socialist-and-democratic-socialist-2018-6\">between democratic socialists and socialists</a>).</p><p>The rising influence of younger, left-leaning politicians like Democratic Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez of New York - who like Sanders identifies as a democratic socialist - has also contributed to the GOP&#39;s ongoing, misleading use of &#34;socialist&#34; as a line of attack. </p><p>But even after Joe Biden - a moderate - became the Democratic presidential nominee, Republicans did not cease the &#34;socialist&#34; attacks and fearmongering. While delivering the final speech at the 2020 Republican National Convention, for example, GOP Sen. Tim Scott of South Carolina said that Biden wanted to turn the country into a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/first-night-of-rnc-was-dark-all-about-spreading-fear-2020-8\">&#34;socialist utopia.&#34;</a></p><p>Biden, who has a long, well-documented record of working with Republicans over his many years in Washington, is a centrist who often butts heads on policy with progressives and those who identify as democratic socialists. There&#39;s really no basis for calling Biden a socialist, but that&#39;s not stopping Republicans and their allies in conservative media.</p><p>&#34;The $3.5 TRILLION Biden-Bernie budget is an effort by Democrats to double-down on their plans to make America a socialist nation,&#34; Republican Sen. Todd Young of Indiana <a href=\"https://twitter.com/ToddYoungIN/status/1440731478216695812?s=20\">said on</a> Twitter last week. </p><p>&#34;Biden needs to realize Americans cannot afford his rapidly increasing socialist agenda,&#34; GOP Sen. Marsha Blackburn of Tennessee said in a tweet on Wednesday. </p><p>Meanwhile, Fox Nation host Tomi Lahren on Tuesday said that the spending proposed by Democrats amount to a <a href=\"https://www.foxnews.com/media/tomi-lahren-biden-spending-socialist-starter-pack-debt-bomb\">&#34;socialist starter pack.&#34; </a></p><h2>Experts define Marxism, socialism, and communism</h2><p>At this point, Republicans have used &#34;socialist&#34; as an attack so often that the word has seemingly begun to lose any meaning. </p><p>&#34;This is actually a really interesting tweet,&#34; Heather Cox Richardson, a historian at Boston College, <a href=\"https://twitter.com/HC_Richardson/status/1443604415815032849?s=20\">said on Twitter</a> in response to Rubio. &#34;It is entirely meaningless, but clearly the scare word &#39;socialism&#39; no longer packs enough of a punch, so he&#39;s going for the even scarier &#39;marxism.&#39; First real tell of GOP fear I&#39;ve seen today.&#34;</p><p>Marxism, socialism, and communism are often - and incorrectly - employed interchangeably. The three are related, but also have distinctions.</p><p>&#34;Marxism is just an adjective designed to highlight Karl Marx&#39;s concept of class warfare and to give the patina of intellectual respectability to such theories,&#34; Schwartz said. </p><p>Communism, in Marx&#39;s view, was &#34;the rule by the working class over a society of political, economic, and social equality,&#34; Schwartz added. &#34;That idealist image seems never to have existed in any society that called itself communist. In fact, what you got was the oppressive rule by a small minority of privileged party bosses over a cowed and submissive population - a.k.a., the Soviet Union, China, Cuba, etc.&#34;</p><p>Socialism in the simplest terms refers to &#34;the state taking a leading role in the economy, essentially creating a welfare state that provides care for people from the cradle to the grave,&#34; Schwartz said, going on to say that there&#39;s &#34;enormous variation in states that have socialist characteristics, from the benign socialism of a Norway or Sweden to the corrupt socialism of a Venezuela.&#34;</p><p>Rubio has &#34;hurled himself into an academic debate that has been raging for decades,&#34; Lawrence Quill, professor of political science at San Jose State University, told Insider.</p><p>&#34;Socialism and Marxism both stand in contrast to capitalism and are critical of it. They share a commitment to common ownership rather than the private ownership of the &#39;means of production&#39; common to capitalist societies,&#34; Quill said. &#34;As far as I can tell, the spending bill does not advocate the abolition of the private ownership of the means of production. Sen. Rubio may therefore rest easy.&#34;</p><p>&#34;It is worth saying that Socialism is sometimes regarded as distinct from Communism, which is supposed to be the full blown realization of [Karl] Marx&#39;s goals,&#34; Quill added. &#34;We may further speculate that what Sen. Rubio was suggesting was that the Democratic spending bill was an example of Communism rather than Socialism.&#34;</p><p>Quill said if Rubio is being &#34;critical of state spending then he is in good company,&#34; and this appears to be &#34;what is really going on in that little Tweet of his.&#34;</p><p>Republicans have consistently portrayed themselves as the anti-Big Government party, and have pushed against some government spending for decades while continuing to support massive increases in defense spending. There was a <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2021/01/14/trump-legacy-national-debt-increasee/\">historic rise</a> in the national debt under Trump, so they don&#39;t always practice what they preach. </p><p>As Quill put it, &#34;The utterances of politicians ought to be taken with a pinch of salt.&#34; </p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/rubio-baselessly-calls-35-trillion-democratic-spending-bill-marxism-2021-9'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a 2021 18:36:11 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/6155f8797b09e80018e59661?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"18e494c2bb2534ca3b724717db3b6dcc","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn59@2020_3/2021/10/01/02-08-30-034_fce72d9863ff1a18.webp","destWidth":2223,"destHeight":1666,"sourceBytes":134800,"destBytes":134800,"author":"insider@insider.com (John Haltiwanger)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6155f906b414c100186323be?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn60@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-31-907_a516f779377ed26b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn83@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-915_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=tjzRwmeuaVY:qK427CdCzR8:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn15@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-214_d963958d74893181.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=tjzRwmeuaVY:qK427CdCzR8:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn63@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-31-608_ed02340273d6e6b9.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-043_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=tjzRwmeuaVY:qK427CdCzR8:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn80@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-042_ac57344bb659c044.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/tjzRwmeuaVY":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn55@2020_3/2021/10/01/02-08-30-401_b43c3f27462be20b.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1633054085841},{"createdTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"Biden signs measure to keep the government funded only hours before shutdown deadline","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/senate-approves-government-funding-extension-hours-before-shutdown-deadline-2021-9","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ab2588a7708e958a7360868?format=jpeg\" alt=\"mcconnell schumer\" height=\"695\" width=\"1390\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell and Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer.\n<p class=\"copyright\">J. Scott Applewhite/AP Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Biden signed a continuing resolution Thursday that barely averted a government shutdown.</li>\n<li>The legislation keeps the government&#39;s doors open through December 3.</li>\n<li>But it does nothing to resolve a debt-limit standoff that&#39;s pushing the US to the brink of default.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>President Joe Biden signed a continuing resolution on Thursday that keeps the US government funded until December 3, only hours before the shutdown deadline. Congress cleared the measure earlier on Thursday. </p><p>The short-term &#34;continuing resolution&#34; passed the Senate in a 65-35 vote, and the House later approved it in a 254-175 vote. Only 34 House Republicans joined every House Democrat in voting for the measure.</p><p>The bill also includes $28 billion in disaster-aid funding for communities ravaged by a recent pair of hurricanes, along with aid to resettle Afghan refugees in the US. But it does nothing to break a deadlock on the debt ceiling, initiated by Republicans, that is pushing the US closer to default.</p><p>&#34;This is a good outcome,&#34; Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer said in a floor speech before the vote.</p><p>&#34;The last thing that Americans need is for the government to grind to a halt,&#34; he said.</p><p>Yet the bill excluded a debt-limit hike that Republicans rejected on Monday as they stepped up their drive to undercut Biden&#39;s multitrillion-dollar economic agenda.</p><p>Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell again said on Thursday that Democrats would have to approve an increase in the nation&#39;s borrowing cap unilaterally through reconciliation. That requires only a simple-majority vote, but the arduous process contains procedural hurdles that Democrats may not be able to clear by December 3.</p><p>Now the US is only 18 days away from a default that <a href=\"https://twitter.com/KateDavidson/status/1442889242850459650?s=20\">could affect every part of the economy</a>, from delayed Social Security checks, missed payments for US troops and federal workers, and cuts to unemployment insurance and Medicaid.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/senate-approves-government-funding-extension-hours-before-shutdown-deadline-2021-9'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/PfHowEzfHI0\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 30 Sep 2021 23:36:03 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5ab2588a7708e958a7360867?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"2f363f0c67868410dce5b5f9c54f0231","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn40@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-29-858_a194f7f1cd5e4e30.webp","destWidth":1538,"destHeight":1154,"sourceBytes":43518,"destBytes":43518,"author":"jzeballos@businessinsider.com (Joseph Zeballos-Roig,Kelsey Vlamis)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5ab2588a7708e958a7360868?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn11@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-31-006_520093f044e967ef.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn83@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-915_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=PfHowEzfHI0:xfkAOuP5gy8:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn11@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-31-433_a0df0bd883f779c7.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=PfHowEzfHI0:xfkAOuP5gy8:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn35@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-32-879_e9eadb07a236b0f4.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-043_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=PfHowEzfHI0:xfkAOuP5gy8:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn3@2020_3/2021/10/01/02-08-36-050_9604b33025ceb721.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/PfHowEzfHI0":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn59@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-32-909_ac238a91f52cc3ea.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1633054085576},{"createdTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"How to withdraw money from the Robinhood app","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-withdraw-money-from-robinhood","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/614b964fde0e7b00194be2dd?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Hand holding phone with money coming out and clicking withdraw button on the robinhood app 2x1\" height=\"834\" width=\"1668\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>After you submit a request to withdraw funds from your Robinhood account, it can take a few trading days for the funds to settle in your account.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Rachel Mendelson/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>To withdraw money using the iOS or Android apps, you&#39;ll have to navigate to your account settings and then click on the transfers option using the website or app.</li>\n<li>But before you can withdraw money from your Robinhood account, you&#39;ll have to meet certain requirements, depending on where the money came from.</li>\n<li>You can make up to five withdrawals a day and are limited to $50,000 per business day.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/investing-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Visit Insider&#39;s Investing Reference library for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Robinhood is one of the most popular trading platforms for young investors, but <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/robinhood-stock-market-controversial-week-traders-cyberattack-accounts-trading-margin-2020-10\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">not all users are happy</a>. If you want to switch from Robinhood to one of Insider&#39;s <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/personal-finance/what-are-the-best-investment-apps\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">top-ranked</a> investment apps, you can either directly transfer securities out of Robinhood into your new <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-a-brokerage-account\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">brokerage account</a>, or you can sell your <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-stock\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">stocks</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-buy-cryptocurrency\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">crypto</a> and transfer the money into your bank account.  </p><p>It&#39;s easy to withdraw money from Robinhood on your iOS or Android mobile device - or by using their website. If you can, it&#39;s best to withdraw your cash into the same bank account you used to fund your account. Otherwise, Robinhood may ask you for extra documents to prove that you own the bank accounts in question.  </p><h2><strong>Before you withdraw your funds</strong></h2><p>Robinhood users should look out for a few rules that limit how and when they can withdraw their cash from their accounts. </p><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>You may be required to wait up to five business days after depositing funds. </strong>Robinhood has an &#34;Instant Deposits&#34; policy, which means some customers can  start trading as soon as they&#39;ve moved cash into their Robinhood account from their checking or savings account. But there&#39;s a catch: even though you might be able to buy and sell stock with your &#34;instant deposits,&#34; you won&#39;t be able to transfer your cash back <em>out</em> of Robinhood right away. Once you&#39;ve moved money into your Robinhood account, you&#39;re typically required to wait up to five business days before you can move that money out. </li></ul><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>After selling stock, you must wait for the trade to settle. </strong>When you buy or sell stocks, ETFs, or options in the United States, it takes three business days for those trades to &#34;settle,&#34; which means the trade is officially complete. If you&#39;re a Robinhood Gold or a Robinhood Instant user, you may be eligible for instant settlement, which means you can withdraw any proceeds right after you sell stocks, ETFs, or, options.  </li></ul><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>You can make only five withdrawals per business day. </strong>If you&#39;ve already hit that limit, you&#39;ll have to wait until the next business day to make any additional transfers.</li></ul><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>You can withdraw only $50,000 per business day. </strong>If you have a large balance that exceeds that amount, you will have to withdraw money in lump sums.</li></ul><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>You have to wait 30 days to withdraw funds from selling free stock. </strong>You know that <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/robinhood-free-stock-sec-finra-regulation-nyse-proxy-statements-hood-2021-08\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">free stock</a> you received from Robinhood&#39;s Referral program? Robinhood will let you sell that stock right away if you want, but you have to keep the cash value of that stock in your account for 30 days before you can withdraw it.  </li></ul><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>You&#39;ll face special rules if you&#39;re switching bank accounts. </strong>Watch out if you funded your Robinhood account with one bank account, and want to move your money into a <em>different</em> bank account. That can look suspicious, and Robinhood has some special rules that apply in that situation. They may ask you to send some documents to prove you&#39;re really the owner of both bank accounts, like sending pictures of your photo ID or bank statements. To avoid the hassle, it&#39;s best if you can withdraw your cash into the same bank account that funded your Robinhood account.</li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong style=\"color: #222222;\">You may not be able to withdraw money while your account is restricted. </strong>Robinhood sometimes restricts users&#39; accounts. That can happen if the user has a negative balance, had a bank account transaction reversed, if the user is suspected of fraud, or for a few other reasons. If your account is restricted, you may not be able to withdraw any money until you&#39;ve contacted Robinhood to clear things up.</li></ul><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>How to withdraw money from Robinhood on iOS </strong></h2><ol><li>Tap the account icon in the bottom-right corner.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6156310300371000184303a1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of Robinhood on iOS with a circle around the account icon, which looks like the head and torso of a person.\" height=\"219\" width=\"500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The account icon can be found at the bottom of your home screen.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Elena Botella</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Click on the three lines located in the top right corner (often called a &#34;hamburger&#34;).<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6156314500371000184303b2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of an account on Robinhood iOS with a box around the Setting menu icon, which looks like three horizontal bars stacked on each other.\" height=\"252\" width=\"410\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Tap this icon to open the account&#39;s Menu.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Elena Botella</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Select <strong>Transfers</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6156316700371000184303bb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the Settings Menu on Robinhood iOS with a box around the &#34;Transfers&#34; option.\" height=\"479\" width=\"572\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Find Transfers near the top of the Menu.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Elena Botella</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Tap <strong>Transfer Money</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615631a0b414c10018633c3f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the Transfer Money option on the Transfers screen of Robinhood iOS.\" height=\"304\" width=\"589\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>&#34;Transfer Money&#34; is the first option in the Transfers menu.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Elena Botella</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Enter the dollar amount and hit <strong>Continue</strong>. Select Robinhood for the &#34;From&#34; field and then the bank account of your choosing for the &#34;To&#34; field. Then select <strong>Transfer</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615631e1b414c10018633c55?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the Transfer screen on Robinhood iOS.\" height=\"759\" width=\"587\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select a dollar amount and hit Continue and you&#39;ll be taken to this screen.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Elena Botella</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li></ol></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>How to withdraw money from Robinhood on Android</strong></h2><ol><li><p>Tap the account icon in the bottom right corner.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6156323600371000184303f4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the Robinhood Android homepage with a box around the account icon, which looks like the head and torso of a person.\" height=\"244\" width=\"562\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The account icon is at the bottom of the home screen.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jasmine Suarez</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Click on the three lines located in the top right corner (often called a &#34;hamburger&#34;).<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615632600037100018430400?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of an account on Robinhood Android with a box around the Menu button, which looks like three horizontal bars stacked on each other.\" height=\"278\" width=\"467\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Tap this icon to open the Menu of your account.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jasmine Suarez</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Tap <strong>Transfers</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6156328f003710001843040d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the Settings Menu on Robinhood Android with a box around the Transfers option.\" height=\"247\" width=\"529\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Transfers is near the top of the Menu.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jasmine Suarez</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Tap <strong>Transfer to Your Bank</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615632b8b414c10018633c92?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the Transfers screen on Robinhood Android with a box around the &#34;Transfer Money&#34; option.\" height=\"285\" width=\"592\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>&#34;Transfer Money&#34; is near the top of the Transfers menu.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jasmine Suarez</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Enter the dollar amount and hit <strong>Continue</strong>. Select Robinhood for the &#34;From&#34; field and then the bank account of your choosing for the &#34;To&#34; field. Then select <strong>Transfer</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615633620037100018430438?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the Transfer screen on Robinhood Android.\" height=\"895\" width=\"595\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>It may take 5 days for money to transfer.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jasmine Suarez</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li></ol></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>How to withdraw money from Robinhood on the web</strong></h2><ol><li>Navigate to the Transfers screen.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615634810037100018430468?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the transfers screen of Robinhood on a web browser.\" height=\"398\" width=\"530\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>First, click Account and then click Transfers.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Elena Botella</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Fill in transfer details and select Review transfer.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615634acb414c10018633ceb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the transfer details screen on Robinhood on a web browser.\" height=\"369\" width=\"783\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>In the &#34;From&#34; field, select Robinhood. In the &#34;To&#34; field, select the bank you want your money transferred to.Then select the dollar amount and then Review Transfer.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Elena Botella</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Click <strong>Submit</strong>.<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615634d70037100018430477?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A screenshot of the review transfer screen on Robinhood on web browser.\" height=\"459\" width=\"483\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>It may take a few days for your money to transfer.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Elena Botella</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li></ol></aside><h2><strong>The financial takeaway</strong></h2><p>You can easily transfer money out of Robinhood into your bank account. But there&#39;s a few catches. Most importantly, you can&#39;t take money out until five business days after you&#39;ve transferred that money into Robinhood. You&#39;ll also need to wait three business days after selling stocks, ETFs, or options before you can withdraw the proceeds. </p><p>On the iOS or Android app, get started by tapping the &#34;Account&#34; button in the bottom right of the screen, which looks like a cartoon person. From your browser window, get started by clicking &#34;Account&#34; in the top right, and then click &#34;Transfers.&#34;</p><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module-end-of-article\" class=\"mceNonEditable\"><a data-type=\"60ad76c4e5224e47165fbabb\" data-title=\"Is Robinhood safe? Botella)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/614b964fde0e7b00194be2dd?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn27@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-30-679_6a8ff5cbe28b9e77.webp","https://i.insider.com/6156310300371000184303a1?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn20@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-31-364_a90d6986ee79f452.webp","https://i.insider.com/6156314500371000184303b2?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn53@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-36-315_6530477f8d7f92fc.webp","https://i.insider.com/6156316700371000184303bb?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn31@2020_3/2021/10/01/02-08-33-842_b417a9d4c4a02adc.webp","https://i.insider.com/615631a0b414c10018633c3f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-32-177_1767ee1b0be21fb2.webp","https://i.insider.com/615631e1b414c10018633c55?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn46@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-31-758_70a4c0ae98f37f3f.webp","https://i.insider.com/6156323600371000184303f4?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn3@2020_4/2021/10/01/02-08-34-348_2095d8b5a31973c1.webp","https://i.insider.com/615632600037100018430400?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn44@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-461_381e3811a84a0ea9.webp","https://i.insider.com/6156328f003710001843040d?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn12@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-30-274_b2584875a22b693e.webp","https://i.insider.com/615632b8b414c10018633c92?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn43@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-31-250_4b2277e35458e09b.webp","https://i.insider.com/615633620037100018430438?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn76@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-30-450_e4e352f2a8ed04b8.webp","https://i.insider.com/615634810037100018430468?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn15@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-34-631_47fd6a1a711e8cf2.webp","https://i.insider.com/615634acb414c10018633ceb?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn60@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-35-753_6b6a9ea824b26bf0.webp","https://i.insider.com/615634d70037100018430477?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn58@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-44-131_8e280c0e683ffae2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn83@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-915_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=evXIVrS1-2s:7nRtWaNs-50:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn63@2020_4/2021/10/01/02-08-33-236_7c9c21fc87b08081.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=evXIVrS1-2s:7nRtWaNs-50:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn28@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-29-914_db51d0d7cc72464c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-043_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=evXIVrS1-2s:7nRtWaNs-50:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn39@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-31-959_42623b0cdf6c7cfe.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/evXIVrS1-2s":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn72@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-35-887_2731e8718fce92d9.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1633054085860},{"createdTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"Morgan Stanley, Interactive Brokers face probe by the SEC and FBI into $100 million in suspicious money from a former Venezuelan oil minister","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/morgan-stanley-interactive-brokers-venezuela-money-laundering-probe-fbi-sec-2021-09","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61561571b414c10018632ff7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"AP21063708334829\" height=\"2700\" width=\"5400\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Morgan Stanley headquarters.\n<p class=\"copyright\">AP Photo/Mark Lennihan</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Federal agencies are probing $100 million in assets allegedly laundered by a former Venezuelan oil minister, the Wall Street Journal said.</li>\n<li>Investigators want to know why Morgan Stanley and IAB were involved in handling possibly dirty money.</li>\n<li>Neither Morgan Stanley nor IAB, the largest online brokerage, is currently accused of wrongdoing.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://newsletter.businessinsider.com/join/4np/10-things-opening-bell?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong data-stringify-type=\"bold\">Sign up here for our daily newsletter, 10 Things Before the Opening Bell</strong><strong data-stringify-type=\"bold\">.</strong></a></li>\n</ul><p><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/ms-stock\">Morgan Stanley</a> and <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/ibkr-stock\">Interactive Brokers</a> are being investigated by several federal agencies, including the SEC and FBI, over $100 million in assets allegedly laundered by a former Venezuelan oil minister, according to a new report in the <a href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/morgan-stanley-and-interactive-brokers-face-federal-scrutiny-in-venezuela-probe-11633020321\">Wall Street Journal</a>.</p><p>The report, citing government documents and people familiar with the matter, says the federal inquiry dates back almost a decade and was accelerated by a whistleblower complaint in 2019. Neither Morgan Stanley nor IAB, the largest online brokerage, is currently accused of wrongdoing.</p><p>The probe centers around two Venezuelan men who are cousins: businessman Luis Mariano Rodriguez Cabello and former oil minister Rafael Ramírez.</p><p>Rodriguez allegedly helped launder $2 billion in illicit funds on behalf of Ramírez, who is accused of stealing the money from Venezuela&#39;s state-owned oil company using inflated contracts.</p><p>Investigators want to know why Morgan Stanley and IAB were involved in handling Rodriguez&#39;s possibly dirty money, despite the US having designated Venezuela a high-risk money laundering country over a decade ago.</p><p>According to the Journal, Rodriguez wired $108 million to his Morgan Stanley account between 2014 and 2015. A Treasury Department report found that Morgan Stanley suspected the funds were part of a money-laundering scheme, but Rodriguez was still able to move the funds to a different bank in 2017.</p><p>Then, in 2018, an associate of Rodriguez moved the money to an IAB account, despite what investigators think were obvious red flags.</p><p>Morgan Stanley declined to comment to the Journal. IAB said it was &#34;committed to compliance with all applicable laws and regulations&#34; but couldn&#39;t comment on any specifics.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/morgan-stanley-interactive-brokers-venezuela-money-laundering-probe-fbi-sec-2021-09'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a
