Wu)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/61561571b414c10018632ff7?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn83@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-31-730_22e968e5d1d092ac.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn83@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-915_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=HufA6f0hfIk:M7qefGm_Qw4:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn3@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-35-274_d65f6feb2392536b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=HufA6f0hfIk:M7qefGm_Qw4:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn28@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-33-471_6088b50958636a73.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-043_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=HufA6f0hfIk:M7qefGm_Qw4:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn63@2020_3/2021/10/01/02-08-32-723_6d9efbf10ac09e7b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/HufA6f0hfIk":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn88@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-30-941_0087b2b9a0d4bccc.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1633054085583},{"createdTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"I went on Norwegian Cruise Line's first US sailing for vaccinated travelers - here's why I felt safe","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/norwegian-cruise-line-vaccinated-cruise-to-alaska-2021-9","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, Insider may earn an affiliate commission. <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/insider-reviews-expertise-in-product-reviews\">Learn more.</a></i></p><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155ca08b414c10018631169?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Author selfie with Norwegian Cruise Line ship\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The writer embarks on Norwegian’s first comeback cruise to Alaska.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li aria-level=\"1\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Norwegian Cruise Line</a> is sailing from US ports again with a 100% vaccination policy, no exceptions.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">COVID-19 tests are still given so everyone may cruise without social distancing or wearing a mask.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">I traveled on Norwegian and felt so safe with the<a href=\"https://www.ncl.com/sail-safe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> guidelines</a>, I can&#39;t wait to sail mask-free again.</li>\n</ul><bi-shortcode id=\"table-of-contents-sticky\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents: Masthead Sticky</bi-shortcode><p>I&#39;m an avid cruiser with dozens of sailings to my credit across multiple cruise lines. So, I was thrilled to be among a small group of media guests invited to join the first comeback cruise from a U.S. port with <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Norwegian Cruise Line</a> on the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Norwegian Encore</a>, sailing from Seattle to Alaska.</p><p>I&#39;ve sailed with NCL many times, but this one felt extra special as the cruise line made its long-awaited return to my home port of Seattle. This was also my first time cruising since COVID and I was curious to see whether I would feel safe enough to enjoy it. </p><p><a href=\"https://www.ncl.com/sail-safe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">NCL&#39;s health and safety protocols</a> are operating with reduced capacity and require all guests and crew to be fully vaccinated, with no exceptions. Still, guests must undergo rapid COVID testing on the day of embarkation, which not only reassured me but meant we could go mask-free while on the ship.  </p><p>I loved sailing with these new protocols and can&#39;t wait to sail mask-free with <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">NCL</a> again. Here&#39;s what my experience was like.</p><h2>Here&#39;s what it was like to sail on Norwegian Cruise Line ship for vaccinated guests.</h2>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tEmbarkation\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615604b3b414c10018632972?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Norweigan Cruise Line Ship at pier\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Norwegian Encore in Ketchikan for the first time after 500 days.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>I arrived at the cruise port early because I wasn't sure how long it would take to board with the new pre-cruise testing requirements. During the embarkation process, rapid antigen tests were administered and <a href=\"https://www.ncl.com/sail-safe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">paid for by the cruise line</a>. All I had to do was complete the online registration and show up a little earlier to allow time for test results to come through.&#160;</p>\n\tPre-boarding COVID testing\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155cb51b414c10018631218?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Guests viewing a presentation aboard NCL vaccinated cruise\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Guests awaiting rapid tests prior to boarding. Everyone wore a mask while awaiting their results.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>A lengthy line led into the testing center, located within a conference room at a neighboring port hotel. But considering a few thousand people were getting tested on the same day, the experience was quite efficient and the test itself only took a minute.</p><p>I waited for my results in a crowded room of eager cruisers, but everyone wore masks so I wasn't too worried about the large group.&#160;</p><p>Test results take anywhere between 15 minutes to two hours, depending on how many were being conducted at a given time. My own negative results came through about an hour after arrival.</p>\n\tChecking in to my stateroom\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155cfc2b414c10018631432?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Towel folded to mimic an animal with sunglasses on\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Cabin stewards still create towel animals as part of stateroom cleaning and turndown service.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>At check-in, I was surprised to find that there was no line. I walked right up to the desk, received my stateroom key, and immediately boarded. It was one of the fastest processes I've ever experienced on a cruise.</p><p>I was booked in a standard balcony stateroom on Deck 11, Forward, with approximately 300 square feet and one Queen bed. I dropped off my luggage and briefly met my cabin steward who noted rooms would be cleaned once per day. As expected, mine was already sparkling clean with a towel animal on the bed to greet me.</p>\n\tThe pool deck\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155d307b414c10018631522?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Pool deck of Encore cruise ship in port at Seattle\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Guests exploring the pool deck prior to sail-away with Norwegian Encore at the port of Seattle.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Next, I headed to where I always go first after boarding a cruise &#8212; the pool deck.</p><p>With a reduced capacity sailing, I was overjoyed to see there would be no rush to secure a lounge chair by the pool. Likewise, there were no waits to zip down the waterslide.</p><p>There were several pool options on the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Norwegian Encore</a>, including a splash pad dedicated to the children. However, due to the vaccine requirements, there were no small kids on my cruise.</p>\n\tDining on board\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155d5d57b09e80018e58a1e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Appetizer and quiche at buffet on NCL cruise\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Norwegian Encore has mini buffets in observation lounges, in addition to the Garden Café buffet.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>With reduced capacity, there was never a wait to be seated at dining venues.</p><p>There were several free <a href=\"https://www.ncl.com/cruise-ship/encore/whats-on-board/dining\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">dining venues</a> on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Encore</a>, in addition to a la carte specialty restaurants including Italian fare, traditional Mexican, a steakhouse, and fine French dining. There were also two options for outdoor seating and taco and pizza spots for quick bites.</p><p>And since everyone on board was vaccinated, guests were able to partake in the classic cruise buffet experience. The Garden Caf&#233; buffet was easy to navigate with several food stations and the crew was always on hand to tidy spills and routinely replace utensils.</p>\n\tCelebrating missed milestones\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155d7487b09e80018e58a87?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Christmas buffet aboard NCL Encore vaccinated cruise\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Norwegian Encore helped buffet guests celebrate missed holidays and milestones.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>On the first full day of sailing, the buffet served a special lunch to help guests celebrate all the milestones and celebrations missed during the pandemic.</p><p>There were stations dedicated to anniversaries, birthdays, Valentine's Day, Christmas, New Year's, graduation, and more.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155e719b414c10018631cba?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Norweigan Cruise Line crew member next to sanitizer station\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>NCL’s crew are well-known for their washy-washy song, encouraging guests to wash up before heading into dining areas.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>While guests don't need to wear masks, even at indoor venues, the crew consistently wore them. The crew must also be vaccinated, but this extra layer of safety seemed to put some guests at ease.&#160;</p><p>It was wonderful to see how happy the crew were to be back to work. They put a smile on my face every day, whether it was hearing them sing their \"washy washy\" song by the sanitizer stations or creating cute towel animals in my stateroom every day.</p>\n\tDaily entertainment\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155d9d67b09e80018e58b40?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Choir of Man performing\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The Choir of Man performs on Norwegian Encore and is included in the cruise fare.\n<p class=\"copyright\">CTS Photos</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Also included within the cruise fare was an endless list of entertainment options, like <a href=\"https://choirofman.com\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">The Choir of Man</a> musical on the main stage, in addition to variety and comic performances, interactive game shows such as \"Deal or No Deal,\" and social mixers like trivia, karaoke, and dance lessons.</p>\n\tActivities at sea\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155da77b414c10018631740?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Chairs at spa aboard NCL cruise\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>My pass for Mandara Spa allowed daily access to the relaxing, quiet space with an incredible ocean view.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Add-on activities were available for an additional fee, including virtual reality in the Galaxy Pavilion, Norwegian Encore Speedway &#8212; the largest racetrack at sea &#8212; and wellness offerings at Mandara Spa.</p><p>While massages are always a nice treat, I opted for a weekly spa pass to use the therapy pool circuit and dipped into a rejuvenating body temperature pool every day after returning from port.</p>\n\tIn port: Ketchikan, Alaska\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155dd1c7b09e80018e58c87?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Tribal members welcome NCL cruise ship at port\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Local tribal members celebrate the arrival of Norwegian Encore with a ribbon-cutting ceremony at The Mill at Ward Cove in Ketchikan.\n<p class=\"copyright\">CTS Photos</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>During my sailing, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">NCL</a> unveiled a new port just outside of Ketchikan, Alaska. During the ribbon-cutting at The Mill at Ward Cove, local tribal members joined the celebration and guests seemed to really love the new facility, which offered quick access to area attractions like Tongass National Forest.&#160;</p><p>While masks weren't required on the ship, they were required while visiting Alaskan ports</p>\n\tExcursions\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155ddbe7b09e80018e58cba?format=jpeg\" alt=\"People in line waiting for busses\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>NCL guests waiting to board shuttle buses back to The Mill at Ward Cove.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>However, for those who wanted to go into downtown Ketchikan, the shuttle bus system was quite time-consuming.</p><p>Guests were required to first receive a ticket for the shuttle, then wait to board, and then take the drive into town, and then endure a lengthy wait to return, all of which ate up valuable port time. This was really the only time I saw people clustered together.</p>\n\tIn port: Icy Strait Point\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155e1817b09e80018e58e07?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Gondola in Icy Straight Point, Alaska\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The new arrival center in Icy Strait Point has a free gondola ride for guests.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>In <a href=\"https://icystraitpoint.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Icy Strait Point</a>, passengers were able to spread out a bit more thanks to a new free gondola ride that transports guests across the destination, from port shops to the zipline and museum attractions.</p><p>The local staff made sure to limit how many people boarded each gondola, so there were never more than four people on each ride during my visit.&#160;</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155e477b414c10018631bab?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Cruise guests take a photo with NCL CEO Harry Sommer\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>NCL president Harry Sommer and his family enjoying the day in Icy Strait Point.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>In Icy Strait Point, I actually spotted Harry Sommer, the president and CEO of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Norwegian Cruise Line</a>. He was there with his family, enjoying the sights and celebrating the latest developments of this cruise port like any other guest.</p>\n\tThe return of cruising\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155e571b414c10018631c0d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"NCL president Harry Sommer\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>I had a chat with NCL president Harry Sommer about his excitement in returning to cruising.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lori A. May/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>I wasn't at all surprised to see Harry Sommer enjoying the cruise with his family, as I knew he was aboard the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Encore</a> to celebrate the comeback cruise. I even had a chance to sit down with him for a few minutes where he shared his excitement about returning to cruising. Sommer had already sailed with the Greek cruise comeback, but his wife insisted they enjoy the Alaska cruise, too.</p>\n\tHow much it costs to cruise\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155e7db7b09e80018e59068?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Person shooting a photo on a cruise ship\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Here I am snapping photos of icebergs while sailing through Dawes Glacier.\n<p class=\"copyright\">CTS Photos</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>A weeklong cruise to Alaska with <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">NCL</a> starts as low as $399 per person and includes meals in three different dining rooms, the buffet, and 24-hour pub fare, and daily entertainment.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Caribbean cruises</a> start as low as $299 per person, while sailings along the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Mexican Riviera</a> start at $489 per person.&#160;</p><p>Cruisers can also take advantage of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">booking deals right now</a>, and Norwegian offers a wonderful selection of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/photos-florida-cruise-ships-cabins-for-solo-travelers-2021-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">cabins for solo travelers</a>, which most cruise lines do not.</p>\n\tThe bottom line\n\t\n\t<p>On this reduced capacity sailing, there was never a wait for anything, whether in the spa, on the pool deck, or even in the casino.</p><p>And, with staggered entry and exit at ports of call, there wasn't the usual mad rush to get off the ship. There was some crowding in ports, but mostly due to a shuttle system that could use improvements.&#160;</p><p>Mostly, though, I loved sailing on a 100% vaccinated cruise. I felt confident in <a href=\"https://www.ncl.com/sail-safe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">NCL's health protocols</a>, and safe knowing that everyone around me was vaccinated and tested negative prior to boarding. Most of all, I appreciated that I could enjoy going mask-free without lines or venue restrictions.&#160;</p><p>I've heard of no COVID cases on my sailing, either. That doesn't guarantee that no cases happened, but to my knowledge, none were discovered. In fact, the only NCL cruise that has <a href=\"https://www.wlky.com/article/fully-vaccinated-louisville-family-quarantined-after-pre-cruise-positive-covid-19-test/37478627\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">reported a positive case</a> was one where a vaccinated guest tested positive prior to the cruise and therefore couldn't board.</p><p>Finally, right now is a great time to sail with fewer crowds and many deals, including discounts on purchases made on the ship.&#160;</p><p>I simply can't wait to book my next mask-free cruise.&#160;</p><h2><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book a Norwegian Cruise Line sailing starting at $299 per person</a></h2>\n\tFAQ: Norwegian Cruise Line\n\t\n\t<h3 class=\"faq-question\"><strong>When is Norwegian Cruise Line sailing again?&#160;</strong></h3><p class=\"faq-answer\">Now! Norwegian Cruise Line first <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/norwegian-cruise-line-restarts-sailing-pandemic-covid-greek-isles-jade-2021-7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">returned to sailing in the Greek Isles</a> this summer, while their first cruise from a U.S. port in over 500 days started in Seattle in August 2021 to relaunch the Alaska cruise season. The first sailings to relaunch from Los Angeles will take place in October 2021 aboard the Norwegian Bliss.&#160;</p><h3 class=\"faq-question\"><strong>Will Norwegian Cruise Lines require a COVID vaccine?</strong></h3><p class=\"faq-answer\">Yes, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Norwegian Cruise Line</a> is sailing with a <a href=\"https://www.ncl.com/sail-safe\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">100% vaccination requirement</a> for crew and guests, no exceptions. While that means younger kids who don't yet qualify for vaccination aren't able to sail quite yet, it does mean guests are assured that all fellow passengers are completely vaccinated.&#160;</p><p class=\"faq-answer\">Ships have also been fitted with medical-grade air filtration systems and are constantly cleaned and sanitized. A dedicated Public Health Officer oversees each sailing to ensure no suspicious sniffle goes undiagnosed.&#160;&#160;</p><h3 class=\"faq-question\"><strong>I'm vaccinated. Do I still have to take a COVID test before sailing on Norwegian Cruise Line?&#160;</strong></h3><p class=\"faq-answer\">Yes, in addition to the 100% vaccination policy, all NCL guests must currently take a pre-cruise COVID test on the day of embarkation. This test is administered and paid for by the cruise line, so passengers won't have to make their own arrangements or spend extra money. Rapid tests are conducted at the port, prior to boarding.&#160;</p><h3 class=\"faq-question\"><strong>My kids aren't vaccinated. Can they cruise with me?</strong></h3><p class=\"faq-answer\">Since the policy prohibits minors who aren't yet eligible for vaccines to sail, only vaccinated children can cruise right now. The youngest cruisers I noticed during my cruise were tweens and teens.</p><h3 class=\"faq-question\"><strong>Are masks required on board Norwegian Cruise Line?&#160;</strong></h3><p class=\"faq-answer\">At no point aboard the ship are passengers required to wear masks. The vaccination and testing requirement combined means guests can enjoy all parts of the ship without social distancing or wearing a mask.</p><p class=\"faq-answer\">However, when visiting ports of call, passengers will need to follow local health guidelines, including mask mandates where applicable.&#160;</p><h3 class=\"faq-question\"><strong>How else is NCL ensuring guest safety aboard their cruises?</strong></h3><p class=\"faq-answer\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Norwegian Cruise Line</a> has a new, staggered embarkation process to streamline check-in and get passengers on their way to vacation fun faster than ever. Boarding documentation is handled electronically to speed up the process and reduce touch points.&#160;</p><p class=\"faq-answer\">On board, guests will enjoy a reduced capacity sailing, which means there's never a wait for the water slides or finding loungers by the pool. Reservations for specialty restaurants are all done electronically, too, with the Cruise Norwegian App, which is free for everyone to use, no internet required.&#160;</p><h3 class=\"faq-question\"><strong>Is Encore the newest ship from Norwegian Cruise Line?&#160;</strong></h3><p class=\"faq-answer\">Norwegian Bliss debuted in April 2018 and then Norwegian Encore first set sail in November 2019 as the newest ship, right before the pandemic hit.&#160;</p><p class=\"faq-answer\">The next ship to debut from NCL is <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cruisedirect.com%2Fcruise-line%2Fnorwegian-cruise-line\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Norwegian Prima</a>, which will start its inaugural celebrations in late 2022 before home porting in Galveston, Texas for the 2023 and 2024 season. Tony Award-nominated musical \"Summer: The Donna Summer Musical\" will be the headlining show for Norwegian Prima, and ports of call will include Costa Maya and Cozumel, Mexico; Roatan Island, Honduras; and Harvest Caye, Norwegian's private island destination in Belize.</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/norwegian-cruise-line-vaccinated-cruise-to-alaska-2021-9'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=vRLIveDw68k:TsuKdkjseJk:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=vRLIveDw68k:TsuKdkjseJk:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=vRLIveDw68k:TsuKdkjseJk:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=vRLIveDw68k:TsuKdkjseJk:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=vRLIveDw68k:TsuKdkjseJk:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=vRLIveDw68k:TsuKdkjseJk:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=vRLIveDw68k:TsuKdkjseJk:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=vRLIveDw68k:TsuKdkjseJk:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/vRLIveDw68k\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 30 Sep 2021 22:04:00 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/6155ca08b414c10018631169?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"fdbd7404b8e2c12c8a270c6207e1acc2","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn52@2020_3/2021/10/01/02-08-22-389_04011dd42941b2e4.webp","destWidth":1200,"destHeight":900,"sourceBytes":64852,"destBytes":64852,"author":"insider@insider.com (Lori A. class=\"copyright\">w&#38;p</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>We have gifts under $50 for every sort of dad, from the hot sauce fan to the history buff.</li>\n<li>If your budget changes, here&#39;s a guide to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cheap-gift-ideas\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">gifts under $25</a>.</li>\n<li>Need more gift ideas? We promise.</p>\n\tA reusable water bottle\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60ad25c2bee0fc0019d59549?format=jpeg\" alt=\"S&#39;well stainles steel water bottle\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">S&#39;well</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01DNHG1NG\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">S'well Stainless Steel Water Bottle, available at Amazon, $45</a></strong></p><p>This reusable water bottle will be sure to help your dad remember to drink more water throughout the day, whether it sits on his office desk, in his car, or in his gym bag. He'll enjoy traveling in style with the refined, soft-edged design that's unique to S'well.</p>\n\tA portable bluetooth speaker\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/601d683a19cbd800188afee9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Soundcore Flare Mini Bluetooth Speaker\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07PPNY861\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Anker Soundcore Flare Mini, available at Amazon, $42.99</a></strong></p><p>If your dad's all for simplicity and good sound, this wireless Bluetooth speaker delivers with its 360-degree audio, minimal buttons, water-resistance, and 12-hour battery life. The bottom also lights up with a colorful display that matches the beat of the music.</p>\n\tA sleek portable charger\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60ad1a69bee0fc0019d594f2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Elecjet Powerpie\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07QY23VWJ\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Elecjet Powerpie, available at Amazon, $49.99</a></strong></p><p>Say hello to the solution to your dad's phone somehow always running out of battery. This portable charger can slip right into his pocket, so he'll never forget it or miss any of your calls.</p><p>Check out more of our top picks for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-battery-packs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best portable chargers and power banks</a>.</p>\n\tA personalized photo calendar\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60ad2649a412370019d31d3c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Walnut Desktop Photo Calendar \" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Artifact Uprising</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.artifactuprising.com%2Fphoto-calendars%2Fwalnut-desktop-photo-calendar\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Artifact Uprising Walnut Desktop Photo Calendar, from Artifact Uprising, $30</a></strong></p><p>If you're far away from your dad but want to remind him of all of your favorite memories together, this personalized calendar can rest right on his nightstand or desk. 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"Hundreds of scam apps caused a surprise $42 monthly charge to land on millions of Android users' wireless bills","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/scam-apps-charged-millions-android-users-2021-9","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/607088854943790018bb1aa1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Android smartphone\" height=\"3530\" width=\"4706\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Nicolas Economou/NurPhoto/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Millions of Android users were plagued by scam apps that placed charges on their wireless bills.</li>\n<li>Users were tricked by a fake prize into providing their phone numbers, <a href=\"https://blog.zimperium.com/grifthorse-android-trojan-steals-millions-from-over-10-million-victims-globally/\">Zimperium</a> reported.</li>\n<li>Google says that all of the apps identified by Zimperium have been removed from the Play Store.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>A massive <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/scam-text-messages-how-to-stop-them-why-increasing-2021-9\">scamming campaign</a> recently plagued the Google Play Store, affecting millions of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-phones\">Android</a> users.</p><p>The scam took place via more than 200 apps run by attackers to scam money from its downloaders, security firm <a href=\"https://blog.zimperium.com/grifthorse-android-trojan-steals-millions-from-over-10-million-victims-globally/\">Zimperium</a> reported.</p><p>Zimperium, a member of the Google App Defense Alliance which scans applications before publishing in the Google Play Store, estimates that 10 million Android users globally were affected by this <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-phishing\">scam</a>.</p><p>The applications posed as seemingly normal downloads, hiding under facades like &#34;Photo Effect Pro,&#34; &#34;Daily Horoscope &#38; Life Palmestry,&#34; and &#34;Free Coupons 2021.&#34; The apps would notify downloaders that they won a prize and would redirect them to enter their phone number on a specific webpage.</p><p>However, by entering their information, users were actually submitting their <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/why-so-many-spam-robocalls-how-to-stop-them-2021-3\">phone number</a> to an SMS service that would start charging their phone bill about $42 per month. </p><p>&#34;Forensic evidence of this active Android Trojan attack, which we have named GriftHorse, suggests that the threat group has been running this campaign since November 2020,&#34; Zimperium stated in their findings. &#34;These malicious applications were initially distributed through both Google Play and third-party application stores.&#34;</p><p>Scams like GriftHorse take advantage of small screens, local trust, and misinformation to trick users into falling for their scams and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-apple-crack-down-fake-apps-scams-ios-app-store-2021-3\">downloading their apps</a>, Zimperium explained. They also prey on &#34;frustration or curiosity&#34; when they try to accept their fake prize. According to Zimperium, the &#34;level of sophistication, use of novel techniques, and determination&#34; of the threat actors had allowed them to remain undetected.</p><p>Google says that all of the apps identified by Zimperium have been removed and the developers of the apps have been banned, but the scam will have lasting effects, <a href=\"https://www.wired.com/story/grifthorse-android-google-play-scam-campaign/\">WIRED reported</a>. Android users who have not stopped the charges have faced unwanted additions to their wireless bill of over $230. </p><p>To prevent scams, the <a href=\"https://www.fcc.gov/news-events/blog/2020/03/02/mobile-phone-texts-spam-and-scams\">Federal Communications Commission</a> recommends consumers &#34;think twice&#34; before clicking any links and to report any unusual activity. If you sent money to a scammer, the <a href=\"https://www.consumer.ftc.gov/articles/mobile-payment-apps-how-avoid-scam-when-you-use-one\">Federal Trade Commission</a> recommends your report the payment right away to reverse the transaction before filing a report with the FTC who can build a case against the scammers.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/scam-apps-charged-millions-android-users-2021-9'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=koMpbCY_9NI:ImuWYrVuL50:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=koMpbCY_9NI:ImuWYrVuL50:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=koMpbCY_9NI:ImuWYrVuL50:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=koMpbCY_9NI:ImuWYrVuL50:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=koMpbCY_9NI:ImuWYrVuL50:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/koMpbCY_9NI\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 30 Sep 2021 21:39:31 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/607088854943790018bb1aa1?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"e0b9b023eb56ca92c707a55c448c3496","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn25@2020_4/2021/10/01/02-08-11-542_e8f2fade4082bd6b.webp","destWidth":4706,"destHeight":3530,"sourceBytes":688908,"destBytes":688908,"author":"ewalsh@insider.com (Emily Walsh)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/607088854943790018bb1aa1?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn25@2020_4/2021/10/01/02-08-11-542_e8f2fade4082bd6b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn83@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-915_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=koMpbCY_9NI:ImuWYrVuL50:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn59@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-33-864_fe24c843d9483dc5.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=koMpbCY_9NI:ImuWYrVuL50:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn59@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-34-654_0fd1e6e5aedca4bf.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-043_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=koMpbCY_9NI:ImuWYrVuL50:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn28@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-34-038_f2fc9aa6c1af8091.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/koMpbCY_9NI":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn50@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-34-767_26df2c3b062ea291.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1633054085715},{"createdTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"The student-loan industry could face a crackdown as yet another Elizabeth Warren ally takes a top oversight job for Biden","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/rohit-chopra-cfpb-student-loan-watchdog-elizabeth-warren-ally-2021-9","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615615ef7b09e80018e5a1a8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Rohit Chopra FTC Federal Trade Commission\" height=\"2664\" width=\"3552\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Rohit Chopra.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Getty/Tom Williams</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The Senate confirmed Rohit Chopra to lead the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.</li>\n<li>Chopra helped create the bureau with Elizabeth Warren and cracked down on the student-loan industry.</li>\n<li>He joins other Warren allies in Biden&#39;s ranks fighting for student-loan borrowers.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Yet another ally of Massachusetts Sen. Elizabeth Warren - one of the biggest advocates for student-loan borrowers in Congress - joined President Joe Biden&#39;s ranks on Thursday.</p><p>Before leaving for recess, the Senate confirmed Rohit Chopra to lead the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB), the government&#39;s consumer protection and oversight agency. Chopra previously served in the CFPB as its first student-loan ombudsman, and he was with Warren when she created the agency in 2011 to ensure people across the country are being financially protected. Now, he joins CFPB as student-loan companies face more stringent regulations leading up to February&#39;s payment restart after more than a year&#39;s pause. In recent weeks, three servicers have said they&#39;ll be shutting down, leaving 16 million borrowers to transition to new companies.</p><p>After Chopra&#39;s nomination was announced in January, Warren wrote on Twitter that she worked closely with him &#34;to set up the CFPB and fight for America&#39;s children.&#34;</p><p>&#34;It&#39;s terrific that President-elect Biden picked Rohit to run the <a href=\"https://twitter.com/CFPB\">@CFPB</a>,&#34; Warren wrote. &#34;He&#39;s been a fearless champion for consumers at the FTC (Federal Trade Commission) and will be a fearless champion leading the consumer agency.&#34;</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Elizabeth Warren  (@SenWarren) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1351168329071915008?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">January 18, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>Chopra left the CFPB in 2015 and was sworn in as a Federal Trade Commissioner in 2018, during which he worked to protect consumers from unfair business practices. But his work at the agency suggests the student-loan industry will be facing much stricter oversight from here on out.</p><p>As the agency&#39;s first student-loan watchdog, he primarily focused on unearthing problems with student-loan companies and ensuring the millions of borrowers across the country were not being mistreated. Chopra helped President Barack Obama establish the Student Aid Bill of Rights, which improves how the companies interact with borrowers, and in 2013, he led the bureau in discovering that more than 7 million borrowers were in default on their debt.</p><p>Since then, the CFPB has revealed a number of findings of student-loan abuses, and in some cases, has taken legal action against the companies. For example, the agency <a href=\"https://www.consumerfinance.gov/about-us/newsroom/cfpb-sues-nations-largest-student-loan-company-navient-failing-borrowers-every-stage-repayment/\">sued</a> Navient, one of the biggest student-loan servicing companies in the US, in 2017 for &#34;illegally failing borrowers at every stage of repayment,&#34; including causing borrowers to take on more debt than they could pay off. </p><p>Now that Chopra is confirmed to lead the agency, he will likely continue enforcing fair student lending. During his March confirmation hearing, Chopra said he will focus on protecting Americans with debt and he acknowledged the challenges that will come in February when the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/student-loan-debt-cancellation-payment-pause-borrowers-disabilities-defrauded-2021-6\">student-loan payment pause</a> lifts.</p><p>&#34;We are at a critical moment when so many borrowers are going to have to restart their payments,&#34; Chopra said during the hearing. He added that he will ensure the restart is &#34;happening lawfully so we can avoid an avalanche of defaults when any moratorium might end.&#34;</p><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/student-loan-company-navient-asked-permission-to-shut-down-2021-9\">Three</a> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/public-service-student-loan-forgiveness-pheaa-elizabeth-warren-2021-7\">student-loan</a> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/student-loan-company-shutting-down-granite-state-management-pheaa-borrowers-2021-7\">companies</a> have already announced their plans to shut down their services at the end of this year, bringing additional administrative hurdles to the already substantial burden the Education Department has with resuming payment collections for 43 million borrowers. </p><p>And Richard Cordray, the head of the Federal Student Aid office and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/elizabeth-warren-richard-cordray-student-loan-debt-cancelation-fsa-cfpb-2021-5\">another Warren ally</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/student-loan-companies-shut-down-accountability-richard-cordray-debt-oversight-2021-9\">suggested</a> in a conference earlier this month that those shutdowns are occurring because those companies do not want to be held to higher accountability standards under Biden.</p><p>Insider <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/student-loan-debt-advocates-biden-federal-student-aid-cfpb-warren-2021-7\">reported</a> in July on the student-loan advocates that have joined Biden&#39;s ranks, and with Chopra now leading the government&#39;s consumer watchdog agency, more reforms to the student-loan industry are likely to come.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/rohit-chopra-cfpb-student-loan-watchdog-elizabeth-warren-ally-2021-9'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=ljtxgEvahAs:i7kNyatMxWM:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=ljtxgEvahAs:i7kNyatMxWM:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ljtxgEvahAs:i7kNyatMxWM:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=ljtxgEvahAs:i7kNyatMxWM:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ljtxgEvahAs:i7kNyatMxWM:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=ljtxgEvahAs:i7kNyatMxWM:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/ljtxgEvahAs\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 30 Sep 2021 20:54:57 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/615615ef7b09e80018e5a1a8?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"ed8e858961b8ade4256ee180dff4a5fc","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn67@2020_4/2021/10/01/02-08-13-948_9904eae5bc4767f4.webp","destWidth":3552,"destHeight":2664,"sourceBytes":458904,"destBytes":458904,"author":"asheffey@businessinsider.com (Ayelet Sheffey)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/615615ef7b09e80018e5a1a8?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn67@2020_4/2021/10/01/02-08-13-948_9904eae5bc4767f4.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn83@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-34-915_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ljtxgEvahAs:i7kNyatMxWM:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn31@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-29-966_3bd3176693d651db.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ljtxgEvahAs:i7kNyatMxWM:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn47@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-32-780_1d9179883e081508.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-043_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ljtxgEvahAs:i7kNyatMxWM:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn52@2020_4/2021/10/01/02-08-29-827_c5c147b32c286b5b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/ljtxgEvahAs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn71@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-33-226_99184dccef5be6b9.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1633054085784},{"createdTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"How to save a Google Doc as a PDF and share it on any device","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-save-a-google-doc-as-a-pdf","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61561bf5b414c1001863349c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"student working on laptop in cafe\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>There are a few different ways to save a document as a PDF in Google Docs.\n<p class=\"copyright\">AleksandarGeorgiev/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li aria-level=\"1\">You can save a Google Doc as a PDF via the File menu in Google Docs.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">From there, you also have the ability to email it as a PDF attachment.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">The same tasks can be accomplished via the Google Docs app on Android and iPhone.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>Visit Insider&#39;s Tech Reference library for more stories</strong></a><strong>.</strong></li>\n</ul><p>Google Docs can be a useful tool for drafting and collaborating on documents, but having a document that anyone can edit isn&#39;t always the best option. Turning a Google Doc into a PDF can prevent people from editing it as well as help you avoid file size limits on email attachments. It&#39;s also useful for living documents since linking to your PDF will always show the most recent version.</p><p>Here&#39;s what you need to know to turn your Google Doc into a PDF, on desktop or mobile.</p><h2><strong>How to save a Google Doc as a PDF on desktop</strong></h2><p>You can either download the PDF to your computer or save it to your Google Drive.</p><h3><strong>Download PDF to your computer</strong></h3><p><strong>1.</strong> Open your <a href=\"https://www.google.com/docs/about/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Google Doc</a>.</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Click <strong>File</strong> in the top toolbar.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61561689b414c10018633141?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screenshot of a Google Doc on desktop\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2920\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Go to &#34;File&#34; at the top.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Devon Delfino</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3.</strong> Hover your cursor over <strong>Download</strong>.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615616dfb414c1001863317b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screenshot of the File menu in Google Docs\" height=\"1227\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Hover over &#34;Download&#34; to see more options.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Devon Delfino</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>4.</strong> Select <strong>PDF Document (.pdf)</strong>.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6156173eb414c100186331ca?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screenshot showing the PDF option in the Download section of the File menu\" height=\"1224\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select &#34;PDF&#34; to download your Google Doc as a PDF.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Devon Delfino</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Your PDF will appear at the bottom of the screen, and you can click the name of the document in that pop-up to open it.</p><h3><strong>Save PDF to Google Drive</strong></h3><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Important:</strong> This method will only work if you&#39;re using the Google Chrome browser.</p></aside><p><strong>1.</strong> In Google Chrome, open your <a href=\"https://www.google.com/docs/about/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Google Doc</a>.</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Select <strong>File</strong> in the top toolbar, then click <strong>Print</strong>.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615617927b09e80018e5a32b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screenshot of the file menu on the desktop version of Google Docs\" height=\"1224\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Choose &#34;Print&#34; to proceed.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Devon Delfino</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3.</strong> Click the drop-down next to <strong>Destination</strong> and choose <strong>Save to Google Drive</strong>.</p><p><strong>4.</strong> Hit <strong>Save</strong>.</p><h2><strong>How to email a Google Doc as a PDF on desktop</strong></h2><p><strong>1.</strong> From within your document, select <strong>File</strong>.</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Hover over <strong>Email</strong>, then choose <strong>Email this file</strong>.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615617e5b414c10018633217?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screenshot of the file menu on the desktop version of Google Docs\" height=\"1227\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select &#34;Email this file.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Devon Delfino</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3.</strong> Add the desired email address in the <strong>To</strong> section, as well as the subject line and any body text you want to include.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6156181e7b09e80018e5a361?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screenshot of the email pop-up menu\" height=\"1219\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Fill out the email menu to proceed.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Devon Delfino</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>4.</strong> If <strong>PDF</strong> isn&#39;t listed in the bottom-left corner of the pop-up, click the drop-down menu to select it.</p><p><strong>5.</strong> Hit <strong>Send</strong>.</p><h2><strong>How to save or share a Google Doc as a PDF on mobile</strong></h2><p>The way you&#39;ll be able to save or share your document as a PDF will depend on if you&#39;re using an Android or an iPhone.</p><h3><strong>On Android:</strong></h3><p><strong>1.</strong> Open the Google Docs app and go into the desired document.</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Tap the <strong>three dots</strong> in the top-right corner of the screen.</p><p><strong>3.</strong> Choose <strong>Share and export</strong>.</p><p><strong>4.</strong> Hit <strong>Save as</strong> to save it to your phone, otherwise select <strong>Send a copy</strong>.</p><p><strong>5.</strong> Select <strong>PDF </strong>and tap <strong>Ok</strong>.</p><p><strong>6.</strong> If you&#39;re saving the PDF to your phone, tap the <strong>download</strong> icon, located to the right of the three dots in the top-right corner. Otherwise, choose who to send your PDF to and send it.</p><h3><strong>On iPhone and iPad:</strong></h3><p><strong>1.</strong> Open the Google Docs app and open your document.</p><p><strong>2.</strong> Tap the <strong>three dots</strong> in the top-right corner of the screen.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61561888b414c1001863327a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screenshot of a Google Doc in the app on iPhone\" height=\"1613\" width=\"1000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select the three-dot icon to begin.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Devon Delfino</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>3.</strong> Select <strong>Share and export</strong>.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615618e07b09e80018e5a3bd?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screenshot of the Google Docs menu on iPhone\" height=\"1720\" width=\"1000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Choose &#34;Share &#38; export.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Devon Delfino</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>4.</strong> Choose <strong>Send a copy</strong>, then make sure <strong>PDF</strong> is selected and hit <strong>Ok</strong>.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61561986b414c100186332e9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screenshot of the Send a copy pop-up menu on iPhone\" height=\"1283\" width=\"1000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Choose the &#34;PDF&#34; option, if it isn&#39;t already selected and hit &#34;Ok.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Devon Delfino</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p><strong>5.</strong> Select the person to send it to, or choose <strong>Save to files</strong> to save it to your phone.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/615619f4b414c10018633320?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Screenshot of the sending options on an iPhone\" height=\"1666\" width=\"1000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Choose who to send your PDF to, or save it to your phone.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Devon Delfino</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module-end-of-article\" class=\"mceNonEditable\"><a data-type=\"61324e4a04eb594a7e5754b8\" data-title=\"How to convert a JPG ff/businessinsider?i=ihHcR7Ps3Yc:3EZOVg0rKf8:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn15@2020_5/2021/10/01/02-08-30-159_85acca03689c51de.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ihHcR7Ps3Yc:3EZOVg0rKf8:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn72@2020_3/2021/10/01/02-08-31-976_0c25b8fe5ae729bd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn99@2020_6/2021/10/01/02-08-33-043_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ihHcR7Ps3Yc:3EZOVg0rKf8:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn79@2020_1/2021/10/01/02-08-30-634_5b893c5f295e3a9d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/ihHcR7Ps3Yc":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn100@2020_2/2021/10/01/02-08-31-520_41170d44270bf586.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1633054085953},{"createdTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","updatedTime":"2021-10-01 10:08:05","title":"Justice Alito says the Supreme Court didn't nullify Roe v. Wade in Texas abortion decision: 'This portrayal feeds unprecedented efforts to intimidate the court'","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/justice-samuel-alito-defends-supreme-courts-texas-abortion-decision-2021-9","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/61560d5fb414c10018632cad?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Justice Samuel Alito\" height=\"1888\" width=\"3776\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Associate Justice Samuel Alito sits during a group photo of the Justices at the Supreme Court in Washington, DC on April 23, 2021.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Erin Schaff-Pool/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Justice Samuel Alito defended the Supreme Court against recent criticisms.</li>\n<li>Alito said members of the media and politicians have tried to paint the court&#39;s work as &#34;sneaky and dangerous.&#34;</li>\n<li>&#34;This portrayal feeds unprecedented efforts to intimidate the court,&#34; he said.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Justice Samuel Alito on Thursday defended the Supreme Court against recent backlash over its decision earlier this month to maintain a Texas law that bans abortion after six weeks of pregnancy.</p><p>Alito was among the majority of justices who <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/scotus-texas-enforce-6-week-abortion-ban-5-4-ruling-2021-9\">on September 2</a> refused an emergency request to block the Texas statute, which is widely considered to be one of the most restrictive abortion measures in the country. The <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/scotus-texas-enforce-6-week-abortion-ban-5-4-ruling-2021-9\">narrow 5-4 decision was handed</a> down on its emergency docket without a full briefing and oral arguments, a process that some experts have called the &#34;shadow docket.&#34;</p><p>Alito criticized the &#34;shadow docket&#34; term and said members of the media and politicians who&#39;ve used the phrase are painting Supreme Court procedure as &#34;sneaky and dangerous&#34; and &#34;sinister.&#34;</p><p>&#34;The truth is there was nothing new or shadowy about the procedures we followed,&#34; the associate justice told an audience at the University of Notre Dame.</p><p>He added that &#34;this portrayal feeds unprecedented efforts to intimidate the court or damage it as an independent institution.&#34;</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Mark Joseph Stern  (@mjs_DC) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1443655119086755852?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">September 30, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>Alito&#39;s remarks come a day after the Senate Judiciary Committee held a hearing to examine the court&#39;s use of the &#34;shadow docket&#34; and the Texas abortion decision. Democrats attacked the court&#39;s conduct, whereas Republicans came to its defense.</p><p>Abortion-rights groups, Democratic leaders, and other critics have slammed the court&#39;s Texas decision, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/biden-texas-6-week-abortion-law-violates-roe-v-wade-2021-9\">saying it violated</a> the 1973 landmark ruling Roe v. Wade, which guaranteed the constitutional right to an abortion until about 24 weeks of pregnancy. </p><p>During his hour-long lecture on Thursday, Alito rejected such criticisms as &#34;false and inflammatory.&#34;</p><p>&#34;We did no such thing and we said that expressly in our order,&#34; he said.</p><p>In an unsigned opinion, the court&#39;s majority said the Texas decision was technical and not based on the substance of the law, which could still be legally challenged. The court in December will hear a major abortion case concerning a Mississippi law that bans the procedure after 15 weeks of pregnancy. </p><p>Alito&#39;s comments echo recent remarks made by his fellow justices Stephen Breyer, Amy Coney Barrett, and Clarence Thomas, who have all<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/clarence-thomas-supreme-court-dangerous-branch-government-abortion-barrett-breyer-2021-9\"> defended</a> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/barrett-breyer-say-scotus-isnt-political-but-ignore-realities-experts-say-2021-9\">the court against negative perceptions.</a> The court currently faces low public approval ratings, according to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/supreme-court-approval-all-time-low-abortion-37-quinnipiac-poll-2021-9\">multiple</a> <a href=\"https://news.gallup.com/poll/354908/approval-supreme-court-down-new-low.aspx\">polls</a>.</p><p>In a question-and-answer portion at the end of his remarks, Alito pushed back on views that the court behaves like a &#34;policy-making body,&#34; saying that justices have different &#34;judicial philosophies&#34; and don&#39;t make decisions based on &#34;what we personally would favor.&#34;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/justice-samuel-alito-defends-supreme-courts-texas-abortion-decision-2021-9'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=8YEs_CyuOMI:1ZG2Mf0xL7U:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img loft","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/lego-queer-eye-fab-five-loft-2021-9","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, Insider may earn an affiliate charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li aria-level=\"1\">Lego gives The Fab Five from Netflix&#39;s &#34;Queer Eye&#34; href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fqueer-eye-the-fab-5-loft-10291\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Lego Queer Eye - The Fab 5 Loft</a> goes on sale October 1 for $99.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">Find more <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/gifts\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">great gift recommendations</a> from Insider Reviews.</li>\n</ul><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"61561d1031045c0011e30bfe\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Queer Eye - The Fab Five Loft (small)</bi-shortcode><p>What&#39;s better than an Emmy? Your own Lego set, of course. Netflix&#39;s &#34;Queer Eye&#34; is the latest TV show to be immortalized in brick form, following &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fthe-friends-apartments-10292\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Friends</a>,&#34; &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fthe-upside-down-75810\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Stranger Things</a>,&#34; and &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2F123-sesame-street-21324\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sesame Street</a>,&#34; to name a few. The <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fqueer-eye-the-fab-5-loft-10291\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Lego Queer Eye - The Fab 5 Loft</a> ($99) goes on sale on October 1.</p><p>The hit series, led by <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/queer-eye-design-expert-bobby-berk-home-office-mistakes-tips-2020-11\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Bobby Berk</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/queer-eye-star-karamo-brown-talks-career-success-2019-6\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Karamo Brown</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/personal-finance/queer-eye-star-tan-france-on-best-money-decisions-2019-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Tan France</a>, <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/queer-eye-antoni-porowski-home-cook-not-chef-interview-2021-5\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Antoni Porowski</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/queer-eye-jonathan-van-ness-interview-facts-2019-11\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Jonathan Van Ness</a> - known collectively as The Fab Five - has amassed a large following thanks to its positive approach to self improvement and empowerment, while also raising awareness to issues such as LGBTQ+ representation. </p><p>Part of Lego&#39;s efforts to promote diversity and inspire creativity, Lego Vice President of Design Matthew Ashton said in a statement, &#34;While the Fab Five rebuild people&#39;s lives, we are on a mission to inspire people to get creative and help rebuild a more positive world.&#34;</p><p>This Lego set for adults recreates The Fab Five&#39;s Atlanta loft from the first and second season. In addition to Lego Minifigures of Berk, Brown, France, Porowski, and Van Ness, there&#39;s Bruley the Dog and two for Kathi Dooley, the hero from the <a href=\"https://www.netflix.com/title/80160037\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">fourth season premiere</a> and Van Ness&#39; high school teacher - one before her transformation (red mullet included) and after.</p><p>Take a tour of what you&#39;ll find inside the Lego Fab 5 Loft.</p>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tFab decor\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155da587b09e80018e58b80?format=jpeg\" alt=\"An interior shot of the Lego Queer Eye set featuring the Atlanta loft in seasons one and two.\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The recreated Lego interior of The Fab Five's modern Atlanta loft from seasons one and two is full of details, down to the furniture and decor. There's even an espresso maker.</p>\n\tThe Fab Five immortalized by Lego\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155eb97b414c10018631e58?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A photo of the Lego Minifigures from the Lego Queer Eye set.\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Bobby Berk, Karamo Brown, Tan France, Antoni Porowski, and Jonathan Van Ness in Lego form. In addition, there's Bruley the Dog and two versions of Kathi Dooley, the \"hero\" &#8212; the person who The Fab Five help in each episode.</p>\n\tGourmet kitchen\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155c7fdb414c100186310b5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Lego Minifigures of The Fab Five from Netflix show &#34;Queer Eye&#34; sitting together in their Lego loft apartment.\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The loft apartment is divided into areas based on each of The Fab Five members' talents. Here, we see food and beverage expert Antoni Porowski whipping up food for the gang.</p>\n\tStylish wardrobe\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155c1ba7b09e80018e584cd?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A Lego Minifigure of Queer Eye stylist Tan France.\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>According to Lego, the company had to create a new wig for style expert Tan France \"that did his gorgeous hair justice.\"</p>\n\tHairdo redo\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155da0bb414c1001863171e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A Lego Minifigure of Queer Eye&#39;s Jonathan Van Ness gives Kathi Dooley a hair makeover.\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Hair expert Jonathan Van Ness prepares to rid Kathi Dooley of her ginger mullet. The <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fqueer-eye-the-fab-5-loft-10291\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Lego Queer Eye &#8212; The Fab 5 Loft</a> highlights the first episode from the fourth season, in which the team gives \"hero\" Dooley a makeover.</p>\n\tThe big reveal\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155dbafb414c100186317d2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"The &#34;transformation chamber&#34; from the Lego Queer Eye set shows the before and after of a makeover.\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The \"transformation chamber\" swivels to show Kathi Dooley before the makeover, and after.</p>\n\tDesign planning\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155e458b414c10018631b91?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A Lego Minifigure of Bobby Berk from Netflix&#39;s Queer Eye planning an interior design.\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Lego Bobby Berk, the group's interior design expert, has an area where he can plan his designs. He even has a laptop to aide his work.</p>\n\tHomage to Bruley\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155dbf67b09e80018e58c21?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Lego Minifigures of Karamo Brown and Bruley the dog from the Lego Queer Eye set.\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Bruley the Dog was a fan favorite &#8212; seen here with Lego Karamo Brown &#8212; and appeared in 16 episodes. Bruley <a href=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B3Kpmb_lvii/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">passed away in 2019</a>. The <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fqueer-eye-the-fab-5-loft-10291\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Lego Queer Eye &#8212; The Fab 5 Loft</a> memorializes The Fab Five's canine friend.</p>\n\tThere's more in the back\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155e830b414c10018631d23?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A rear view of the Lego Queer Eye set that shows the loft apartment entrance.\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>On the back of the apartment you'll find the entrance and an area for The Fab Five to store their gear.</p>\n\tAssembly required\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155e614b414c10018631c44?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A person assembling the loft apartment from the Lego Queer Eye set.\" height=\"1124\" width=\"1500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fqueer-eye-the-fab-5-loft-10291\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Lego Queer Eye &#8212; The Fab 5 Loft</a> comes with 974 pieces and is made for adults, but like all Lego sets, it's just as fun to build.</p>\n\tWhat's on TV?\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155f7757b09e80018e59607?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A flat screen TV made from Lego with an image of the Netflix &#34;Queer Eye&#34; TV show.\" height=\"1124\" width=\"1500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Naturally, the set includes a flat screen TV with \"Queer Eye\" playing. The <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fqueer-eye-the-fab-5-loft-10291\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Lego Queer Eye &#8212; The Fab 5 Loft</a> is a collaboration between Lego and \"Queer Eye\" creators Scout Productions.</p>\n\tThe Lego Fab Five Loft in 360\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6155debab414c100186318fa?format=jpeg\" alt=\"A 360-degree animated video of the Lego Queer Eye set.\" height=\"450\" width=\"600\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Lego</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fqueer-eye-the-fab-5-loft-10291\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Lego Queer Eye &#8212; The Fab 5 Loft</a> has plenty of details all around.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\"
